scenes.background: [Monica] and you decided to handle the task on your own. [Bob] walks in.
scenes.description: 'I see you two are deep into it. Need any help, or should I stay out?' He leans against the doorway.

options.text: We could use some extra hands, Bob. Join us.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and social skills by inviting Bob to help, but it may affect your self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Thanks, Bob, but I think we got this for now.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by taking control of the situation, but empathy and emotional perception could be improved.

options.text: How about you keep an eye on things and jump in if needed?
options.analysis: You show a balanced approach by planning to involve Bob if necessary, though better emotional perception might help.
